About the Company: Hindustan Zinc Ltd is Indias only integrated producer of zinc and lead. The company manufactures three qualities of zinc -- special high grade zinc used in construction, infrastructure, household appliances etc; high grade zinc and prime western zinc.In addition the company also manufactures pure lead used in lead acid battery, ceramic glazes, electrodes, etc,silver used in photographic material, conducter, jewellery, etc,cadmium used in Ni-Cd batteries, stablizers, coating and alloys & sulphuric acid used in fertilizers, dyes, textiles, sugar refining, etc..The company also in the business segment of Wind Energy, Silver Metal, Zinc and Lead.
